Interfaces

Interface Position

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sheet.Position

    public interface Position
    Interface for Cell positions. The Position class holds a unique column and row index.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColumn() 
      int getRow() 
      Position offset(int x, int y)
      Method to get a new Position from this Position and the defined offset.

    • Method Detail

      • getRow

        int getRow()
        Returns:
        the row index of row index of the position

      • getColumn

        int getColumn()
        Returns:
        the column index of the row

      • offset

        Position offset(int x,
              int y)
        Method to get a new Position from this Position and the defined offset.
        Parameters:
        x - Column offset
        y - Row offset
        Returns:
        New Position instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - When the indexes with the applied offset are negative values
